description:
Great for commuting or travel and a secret weapon for thru-hiking, this compact umbrella folds up small and has an ultralight aluminum frame. Made by a company headquartered in Vancouver, where they know a thing or two about rain.

  • Made of quick drying synthetic Pongee umbrella fabric
  • Ultralight aluminum frame is also sturdy in the gusts
  • Automatic opening mechanism
  • Closed length is 28cm. Open diameter is 107cm
name: Vancouver Umbrella Inc Auto Mini Umbrella
